name: Circles eater
description:
Circles eater is a simple game in which you move around with a blue circle and eat other white circles which enlarge your size which decreases by time and you gain score by eating other white circles and you lose by touching the red squares.

Controls:
  • Arrows / WASD to move (Windows).
  • Touch & drag (Android).
Team:
  • Programmer: Mostafa Nady.
  • Designer: Mostafa Nady.
  • Graphics: Mostafa Nady.
  • Music & SfXs: Diaa Khaled.
